body.p: Liquid Site uses a specific terminology that is important to understand in order to administrate a web site. These same terms are also used extensively in this reference manual and in other documents. The list below attempts to define and describe the most important of these terms.

item.title: Site
item.text: A web site consists of a collection of documents and files available from a single location on the world wide web. A web site is normally identified by a host name, for example www.liquidsite.org. It is possible to have several web sites separated by different directories on a single host. Web sites cannot share information, such as files, users, or similar (but they can of course link to public resources on other sites).
